Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.command

Contains all the commands classes, the Command pattern is a behavioral design pattern. Command
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command
    This interface must be implemented by every command.
    WeaponCommand
    This command represent all the command that can be generated by a weapon
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandsTest
    Tests some Commands
    DoneCommand
    This command change the player state from currentState to nextState
    EffectCommand
    This command represent an effect that a weapon can have on a single player
    GrabCommand
    This commands represent a grab action
    GrabTileCommand
    This command represent the action of grab a tile
    MoveCommand
    This command represents a move action
    PayReloadBeforeShotCommand
    This command actualize the payment for the reload before the shoot for the action possible only in the final round
    PayReloadWeaponCommand
    This command actualize the payment for the reload of a weapon
    PayScopeCommand
    This command actualize the payment for the scope
    PayWeaponCommand
    This command represents the action of buy a weapon
    PayWeaponOptionCommand
    This command actualize the payment for the weapon's option selected
    RespawnCommand
    This command represent the reSpawn action
    SelectAggregateActionCommand
    This command represent the action of select an aggregate action
    SelectAmmoPaymentCommand
    This command represent the action of select an ammo for a payment
    SelectBuyingWeaponCommand
    This command represent the action of select the weapon to buy
    SelectDiscardedWeaponCommand
    This command represent the action of discard a weapon used only when a player has already 3 weapons
    SelectPaymentCommand
    This command represent the action of select an item for pay something
    SelectPowerUpCommand
    This command represent the action of select a power up
    SelectPowerUpPaymentCommand
    This command represent the action of select a power up for a payment
    SelectReloadingWeaponCommand
    This command represent the action of select a weapon to reload
    SelectScopeCommand
    This command represent the action of select a scope
    SelectShootActionCommand
    This command represent the action of select a shoot action
    SelectTargetPlayerCommand
    This command represent the action of select a player as target
    SelectTargetSquareCommand
    This command represent the action of select a square as target
    SelectWeaponCommand
    This command represent the action of select a weapon
    SelectWeaponModeCommand
    This command represent the action of select a weapon mode
    ShootCommand
    This command represent the shoot action
    UseNewtonCommand
    This command represent the action of use a newton
    UseScopeCommand
    This command represent the action of use a scope
    UseTagbackGrenadeCommand
    This command represent the action of use a tagback grenade
    UseTeleportCommand
    This command represent the action of use a teleport
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalUndoException
    Thrown when an UN-doable Command Command.undo() method is invoked
